review: enjoying the Fire Stick so far
author: Jimmy

review: It's very responsible and its GUI is nicely navigable, and its access to multiple apps is nice.
author: Mario Pineda

review: Works okay but wireless N reception is not that great it only works on some of the lower end wifi channels.
author: Wayne

review: Easy to set up.  Does exactly what it is advertised to do.  It's all I wanted.  Plain and simple.
author: GailSuzann

review: Misleading Advertising--it does NOT have HBO.  HBO is not available on my Fire TV Stick.  Showtime is, many other things are.  Not HBO.  Even though the ad says it is.  Misleading, that.
author: Michael "Michael"

review: really amazing color and graphics.  very easy to navigate around.  highly recommend
author: Jgsesq

review: the cord could have been longer; but it works great!
author: al  bertacini

review: I like being able to use my Amazon Prime directly on my TV, but the set up/configuration only used the middle portion of the screen. Therefore you have to scroll more to see more content. Otherwise I like it.
author: Elizabeth Hess
